title: San Antonio Spurs Danny Green, Boban Marjanovic teach Selfies 101

Photo: Mendoza, Madalyn S, Instagram.com/Twitter.com Image 22 of 23 Or, on a bus. Or, on a bus. Photo: Mendoza, Madalyn S, Instagram.com/Twitter.com Image 23 of 23 San Antonio Spurs Danny Green, Boban Marjanovic teach Selfies 101 1 / 23 Back to Gallery By the looks of it new Spur, Boban Marjanovic, is fitting in nicely with the squad after being taken under the wing of Danny Green.
He was even worthy of making Green’s Instagram page . The former Tarheel has already dubbed the seven-footer his “road dog” and he’s helping him get acquainted with one of America’s favorite pastimes – selfies.
RELATED: San Antonio Spurs hung out with Zac Efron, Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne in Atlanta
“My road dog this year,” Green captioned an Instagram selfie of himself on the team plane with Serbian Spur. “Trying to figure out how to take selfies lol doesn’t know how to work his phone just yet #gentlegiant.”
Marjanovic has posted a total of six points and seven rebounds throughout the Spurs preseason thus far. The team will play in San Antonio for the first time since April on Sunday, at the newly-renovated AT&T Center. The game against the Detroit Pistons tips off at 3 p.m.
